member.name: T:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets
member.summary: Default character sets.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.EnglishAlphanumeric
member.summary: English alphanumeric.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.Base64
member.summary: Base64 characters.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.USKeyboard
member.summary: Keys from a standard US keyboard.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.HexadecimalUppercase
member.summary: Hexadecimal characters, using uppercase letters.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.HexadecimalLowercase
member.summary: Hexadecimal characters, using lowercase letters.

member.name: F:PrettyId.DefaultCharacterSets.UrlSafe
member.summary: URL-safe characters (RFC 3986 unreserved characters). Includes: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, hyphen, underscore, period, and tilde.

member.name: T:PrettyId.IdGenerator
member.summary: ID generator for creating uniform, readable IDs.

member.name: P:PrettyId.IdGenerator.MaximumLength
member.summary: Maximum length used when generating without specifying a maximum length. Default is 32. Must be greater than zero.

member.name: P:PrettyId.IdGenerator.ValidCharacters
member.summary: Valid characters to use when generating IDs. Must contain at least one character.

member.name: P:PrettyId.IdGenerator.MaxIterations
member.summary: The maximum number of iterations allowed when generating a unique ID. This value may need to be larger if using a restrictive set of allowed characters. Default is 64. Minimum is 1. Maximum is 256.

member.name: P:PrettyId.IdGenerator.UseCryptographicRng
member.summary: Whether to use cryptographically secure random number generation. Default is false. When true, uses RandomNumberGenerator instead of GUID-based randomness.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate an ID generator with default settings. Uses English alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and a default maximum length of 32.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.#ctor(System.Char[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiate an ID generator with a specific character set.
member.param: Array of valid characters to use for ID generation.
Default maximum length for generated IDs.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.Char},System.Int32)
member.summary: Instantiate an ID generator with a specific character set.
member.param: HashSet of valid characters to use for ID generation.
Default maximum length for generated IDs.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Generate an ID using the configured maximum length.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.Generate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate an ID with a specific length.
member.param: Length of the ID to generate.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.Generate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate an ID with a prefix and specific maximum length.
member.param: Prefix to prepend to the ID. Can be null or empty.
Maximum total length including the prefix.
member.exception: Thrown when maxLen is invalid or prefix is too long.
Thrown when unable to generate an ID within the iteration limit.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.GenerateUrlSafe(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a URL-safe ID (uses only characters safe for URLs without encoding). Uses: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, hyphen, and underscore.
member.param: Prefix to prepend to the ID. Can be null or empty.
Maximum total length including the prefix.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.GenerateKSortable(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a k-sortable ID with a timestamp prefix for chronological sorting. Format: {timestamp}_{random} where timestamp is Unix milliseconds in base36.
member.param: Optional prefix to prepend before the timestamp.
Maximum total length including all parts.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.GenerateAndEncodeBase64(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate an ID and encode it as base64. This method generates a random string, then base64-encodes it. Note: The result will be longer than the input due to base64 encoding overhead.
member.param: Prefix to prepend to the final encoded result.
Maximum total length including the prefix.

member.name: M:PrettyId.IdGenerator.WarnIfRestrictiveCharacterSet
member.summary: Warns (via console) if the character set is very restrictive and may cause performance issues. A character set is considered restrictive if it has fewer than 16 characters.
